description.raw:
This first initial installation performs the following actions:

* Install the pandora server in router trio machine. It needs mysql so it is installed also in router machine with a random root password.
* Install the pandora_console also in router trio machine. This is needed to get SQL schema and data and provides the web interface via apache2, which is being also installed in the router.
*  Install pandora agents in router, simulation and field machine.

Pandora console can be used from http://10.0.0.50/pandora_console/ with user admin and password pandora, as installed by default. You will need to wait until simulator and field machines are up to see the agents in your console.

  • Install pandora agents in router, simulation and field machine.

Pandora console can be used from http://10.0.0.50/pandora_console/ with user admin and password pandora, as installed by default. You will need to wait until simulator and field machines are up to see the agents in your console.
